resources.string: Halo Burger is one of the oldest hamburger chains in the United States and originated in Flint, MI way back in 1923. Originally called Kewpee, the company served its first hamburger out of a \"boxcar\" style wagon on Harrison St. in Downtown flint.

There, we created the world\'s first \"deluxe\" hamburger, made with 100% fresh, never-frozen beef, pressed on a searing hot grill to give it just the right amount of char. Then we top it with fresh cut tomatoes, lettuce and mayonnaise. That\'s one deluxe burger!
Get ready to enjoy a delicious meal at Halo Burger.
Scan your barcode at the register before you pay or tell the cashier the code below the barcode to earn rewards for your purchase.
Get points for every purchase and earn great rewards like free food.
Opt-in for email offers from us!
Please present this or read the code to your cashier at time of purchase.
Scan your barcode at the register (before you pay!) or tell your cashier the code below the barcode to earn points for your purchase.
Scan your code at the register or read the code to your cashier when you make a purchase to earn points.
